record.field:
BIR statutory tax filing schedule for 2026. Includes all monthly withholding taxes (1601-C, 0619-E), quarterly VAT (2550Q), quarterly EWT (1601-EQ), and annual income tax (1702-RT/EX).
Child project of: Program: Finance Month-End Close & Tax Filing - 2026

BIR Form: 1601-C (Compensation) Period Covered: Dec 2025
BIR Filing & Payment Deadline: 2026-01-15
Workflow: 1. Preparation (Finance Supervisor - BOM): 2026-01-09 2. Report Approval (Senior Finance Manager - RIM): 2026-01-12 3. Payment Approval (Finance Director - CKVC): 2026-01-13 4. Filing & Payment (Finance Supervisor - BOM): on/before 2026-01-15

BIR Form: 1601-C / 0619-E Period Covered: Jan 2026
